wikipedia_page.main:
Carl Amos (born 30 March 1973) is an English cricketer who has played his 13 List A games for Norfolk County Cricket Club.
His highest score of 76 came when playing for Norfolk in a match against Surrey Cricket Board.He has also played 97 Minor Counties Championship games  and 52 Minor Counties Trophy Matches for Norfolk.
